name: Floresta Do Pesadelo
description:
In this old school horror game, you're in a person's nightmare. In this nightmare, you are in a dark forest with a creature chasing you: The Dream Eater. To escape it, find bells scattered in specific places within the forest. As you find them, touch them. After ringing the 8 bells, you will wake up. But watch out, the Dream Eater may wake you up too, and if that happens you die.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move the player

Mouse - Move the camera

E - Ring bells

Shift - Sprint (Only for 5 seconds,then you need to rest)

Space - Jump

FEATURES

High definition graphics

Secrets and easter eggs
